title: lagosnoir
author: lagosnoir
content: Description: UNTITLED (2021) 32 inches width by 42 inches height. Pyrography art (drawing with burn marks) by Hanson Okere. Realistic image of an African model in a thoughtful pose. Hanson Okere is a rising star in the contemporary art scene.Weight: About 10kg.Front Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6EZEBack Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6EZPAccepted payment method: Bitcoin Escrow Only.Starting bid:0.050 BTC with bid increments of 0.005 BTC.Buy it now: 0.0695 BTCEnd date and time: The end of September 30, 2023. 11.59 PM Midnight ( GMT)See countdown Link: https://www.tickcounter.com/countdown/4366946/arttrade-auction-septÂ Shipping: Bid price includes worldwide courier to your country. Buyer responsible for own country taxes.Delivery will be by international shipping with tracking. DHL or similar company.After the auction ends, I will contact you for delivery information as well as name escrow chosen on bitcointalk.Do not hesitate to ask questions.arttrading.org

comments.author: iPaD
comments.body: Your Arts represent true Nigerian and African Heritage. Very Demure Keep it On.
